english.segment1: Searching the world. The lost will be found. In freedom we live. As one we cry out. You carried the cross. You died and rose again. My God. I'll only ever give my all
english.segment2: You sent Your Son. From heaven to earth. You delivered us all. It's eternally heard. I searched for truth. And all I found was You. My God. I'll only ever give my all
english.segment3: Jesus we're living for Your Name. We'll never be ashamed of You. Whoa o oh. Our praise and all we are today. Take take take it all. Take take take it all
english.segment4: You sent Your Son. From heaven to earth. You delivered us all. It's eternally heard. I searched for truth. And all I found was You. My God. I'll only ever give my all
english.segment5: Jesus we're living for Your Name. We'll never be ashamed of You. Whoa o oh. Our praise and all we are today. Take take take it all. Take take take it all
english.segment6: Jesus we're living for Your Name. We'll never be ashamed of You. Whoa o oh. Our praise and all we are today. Take take take it all. Take take take it all
english.segment7: Running to the One. Who heals the blind. Following the shining light. In Your hands. The power to save the world. In my life
